content: super easy american girl slouch hat by patricia klonoski materials h hook and any worsted weight yarn tc= triple crochet make magic_ring round 1 into magic_ring place 12 triple crochet tc join to top of first tc round 2 2 tc into each stitch around 24 tc join to top of first tc round 3 *1 tc in next stitch 2 tc in next * follow *-* around 36 tc join to top of first tc round 4-5 1 tc in each stitch around join to top of first tc 36 tc round 6-8 1 single_crochet around join to top of first single_crochet 36 single_crochet fo
